name: EF EVE™ - Volumetric Video Platform (VR & Desktop)
description: EF EVE™ is a volumetric video platform where you can experience 3D representation of real world. Within seconds you can load “holograms” of people into VR who will share with you their passion for gaming, arts, education or dance and more.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 10,  64 Bit Processor: Intel Core i5-4690K Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 10,  64 Bit Processor: Intel Core i7-6700K @ 4.00 GHz Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1080 8 GB Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 2 GB available space
